speaker: speaker1
text: I have made up my mind . I am getting a tattoo .

speaker: speaker1
text: Yeah ! Why not ? They are trendy and look great ! I want to get a dragon on my arm or maybe a tiger on my back .

speaker: speaker2
text: Yeah but , it is something that you will have forever ! They use indelible ink that can only be removed with laser treatment . On top of all that , I have heard it hurts a lot !

speaker: speaker2
text: Of course ! They use this machine with a needle that pokes your skin and inserts the ink .

speaker: speaker1
text: Oh , I didn ’ t know that ! I thought they just paint it on your skin or something .

speaker: speaker2
text: I think you should reconsider and do some more research about tattoos . Also , find out where the nearest tattoo parlor is and make sure they used sterilized needles , and that the place is hygienic .

speaker: speaker1
text: Maybe I should just get a tongue piercing !
